name: A Purrfect Home
description:
A fresh start... as a newly adopted cat. You've finally been picked by some humans! Will this be your forever home? Interact with objects and live that best cat life. >:3 Try not to stir up too much trouble though, since you never know if your humans will keep you and you might have to start all over...

Arrow Keys to move
Spacebar to jump
A for Good Action
S for Bad Action
Z to swipe things (swipe the laser pointer if you can find it, to play the laser minigame and make your humans love you!)

Credits:
Art & Music - Okienoki
Art & Programming - Daebak
